actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to require an investigation and study of the decomposability and destructibility of materials.

summary.text: Provides, under the Solid Waste Disposal Act, for an investigation and study by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare of the decomposability and destructibility of materials. Requires the Secretary to report the results of such investigation to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to require an investigation and study of the decomposability and destructibility of materials.
